Business Description

Consultant specializing in railway track engineering

Measurement and diagnosis of track displacement by high-speed track inspection car

Flaw detection and measurement of rail wear by rail flaw detection car

Support for the introduction of railway track monitoring

Processing and analysis of railway track monitoring data

Maintenance and inspection of railway track monitoring data

Technical assistance for construction and maintenance of railway tracks (including countries other than Japan)

Measurement and assessment of railway side environment (noise and vibration)

Analysis and evaluation of railway track structure (dynamic response of the track, long rail, etc.)

Dynamic characteristic measurement of the tracks and rolling stocks (wheel load, lateral force, vibration acceleration, etc.)

Design of the railway track structure (slab track, turnout, etc.)

Training and technical support for railway track management, turnout, etc.

History

July 1979

Nihon Senro Gijutsu Consultants Co.,Ltd. (NSC) was established.

Business for measurement, survey, and design services of tracks was started.

July 1986

Company name was changed to Nihon Senro Gijutsu Co., Ltd. (Japan Railway Track Consultants Co., Ltd.)

January 1993

Abbreviated name of the company was changed to NSG from NSC.

December 2016

Railway Track Monitoring Center was established.

March 2017

Track Maintenance Technical Education Division was established.

June 2017

NSG became a group company (consolidated subsidiary) of East Japan Railway Company.
